function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 due to human movement","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Imposing travel restrictions and quarantines, promoting social distancing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance systems, temperature screening","People":"General public, travelers, commuters","Owner":"Municipal governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of 14-day quarantine for COVID-19","Impact":"Inappropriate containment of the virus","Mitigation":"Revising quarantine guidelines based on scientific evidence","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, testing and monitoring devices","People":"Public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Decline in social activities due to travel restrictions","Impact":"Economic and social disruption","Mitigation":"Economic support for affected businesses, promoting virtual alternatives for social interactions","Technologies":"Online platforms for remote work and socializing, digital payment systems","People":"Business owners, employees, general public","Owner":"Government, businesses"}]}
